attributes.title: horrible choice
attributes.review:
-
an orange made this app and it shows.. the ra_ist (c/p) that made this app wasn’t thinking.. it made my whole phone crash.. I had to delete it before it happened again. DONT GET THE APP!!!!!!!!! don’t support this sick show

attributes.title: ✨awful✨
attributes.review: When I opened the app an Oompa Loompa looking Cheeto thing appeared on the screen. My grandma was looking over my shoulder and she had a heart attack and sadly passed away.😔❤️ so if you value your loved ones please don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app took forever to download. When it finally downloaded and I opened it I was very disappointed on the way it was laid out. This app is a disgrace to the App Store and should be taken down. It is disgusting.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app is not only poorly designed, it also crashes very often. Almost every single time I entered the app, I would be kicked out. Horrible! The Manny will not be televised.

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible!!!
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever had the displeasure of witnessing. This needs to be taken down absolutely immediately and I feel like it was a crime to have this app made in the first place.

attributes.title: Oof
attributes.review:
Not a Gen-Z member her to defame trump, I was actually very excited to give my support to our greatest President our nations ever seen. But upon downloading this app my member 
 shrunk to an inch and re-circumcised itself, please don’t download this app and spread awareness of the dangers of this fake-app.

attributes.title: CRASHED MY PHONE
attributes.review: This is the worst app i’ve ever used! The second I got it my whole phone died. I’m very upset!❤️I cant believe such idiotic app making is allowed on here. So no one should use this app ever.😌😌✨💕🦋You tried, and failed miserably🌸🌟❣️

attributes.title: terrible app🤢
attributes.review: got this app excited to see what cinnamon hitler was up to but it’s UNUSABLE!!! weird font, graphics, stupid articles & a lot of pictures of this weird orange dude?!?! not sure what the point of this app is besides a waste of space🧚🏻‍♂️🥰

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: it took weeks to download! when it finally did and i opened it, my google home started saying “donald trump says you’re a fat piece of sh*t!” my phone started to glitch and then just went black! i had to get a new phone because the app completely broke it! got me so stressed that i had horrible diarrhea!!! unbelievable. and to think that the almighty and handsome donald trump would let this happen.

attributes.title: Great App!
attributes.review: Honestly, the app is designed perfectly. I love the app and our president! Trump 2020!
